content: Hi folks! We made some changes to the compose box recently, and I was wondering if anyone has feedback to share. :)
I'm also specifically curious how folks are interpreting the Aa button. (Please PM me or spoiler your response to make it easier to get independent opinions.)
I think I'd interpret it more as "Fonts", instead of "Formatting", but it's close enough to not be a problem. Maybe a brush icon would also work?
I would not have expected it to mean "help". I would have expected a ? or Help or similar. Honestly, there's enough room there for a full "Formatting help".

Feedback

I wouldn't expect Aa to house formatting help. Generally it is used to uncover another toolbar with formatting options so I was expecting that at first
Didn't think much about it other than... well, it must be formatting related. Then I Hovered over it. Still wasn't sure. Clicked it... ah, it's help. Would have expected that behind a question mark.
Thanks for the feedback on the Aa button! We have deemed it too confusing and replaced it with a ?. :)
